sentences.en: A happy parent makes for a happy child.
sentences.cn: 有快乐的父母，才会有快乐的孩子。

sentences.en: A very clingy child can drive a parent to distraction.
sentences.cn: 依赖性太强的孩子会逼得父母心烦意乱。

sentences.en: Being a parent is her first priority.
sentences.cn: 做好母亲是她的头等大事。

sentences.en: Children under 14 should be accompanied by a parent.
sentences.cn: 14 岁以下儿童须由一位家长陪同。

sentences.en: Each unit including the parent company has its own, local management.
sentences.cn: 包括母公司在内，每个单位都有自己的地方管理层。

sentences.en: He lives on a single parent's allowance of £70 a week.
sentences.cn: 他靠每周70英镑的单亲家庭生活补助过日子。

sentences.en: I was bringing up my three children as a single parent.
sentences.cn: 作为单身母亲，我独自抚养我的3个孩子。

sentences.en: Many children are now born into or raised in one-parent families.
sentences.cn: 现在很多孩子在单亲家庭中出生或成长。

sentences.en: Melissa’s spending the weekend at her parents’ house.
sentences.cn: 梅利莎正在父母家度周末。

sentences.en: New shoots appear near the parent plant.
Ninety per cent of lone parent families are headed by mothers.
Parent birds began to hunt for food for their young.
sentences.cn: 亲鸟开始为幼鸟寻找食物。

sentences.en: The eggs are guarded by both parents.
sentences.cn: 那些蛋由两只亲鸟共同守护着。

sentences.en: The offspring contain a mixture of the genetic blueprint of each parent.
sentences.cn: 子女身上遗传了父母双方的基因型板。

sentences.en: This happens whether the children are in two-parent or one-parent families.
sentences.cn: 不管孩子是生活在双亲还是单亲家庭，这种情况都会发生。

sentences.en: To be a parent is a terribly difficult thing.
To be appreciated as a parent is quite unusual.
Zeneca was at last demerged from its parent firm, ICI.
sentences.cn: 捷利康公司终于从其母公司帝国化工集团中分离了出来。

words.tran_cn: 父母亲的，父母的；亲代的，亲本的
出身；亲子关系；门第；起源

phrases.tran_cn: [地质]母质；母质层；[电子]母体材料；初始物质
n. 单亲；单身母亲；单身父亲

trans.tran_cn: 父亲（或母亲），先辈，根源，起源，保护者
trans.tran_en: the father or mother of a person or animal
